ios.subtitle: NFL, NBA, MLB, WNBA & PGA Golf

editorialNotes.standard: Regardless of what sports you follow, stay in the loop with up-to-the-minute scores, breaking news on signings and trades, and insightful analysis on matchups and drafts.
editorialNotes.short: Game previews, team stats and post-game recaps

editorialNotes.standard: We secretly dream of winning the lottery and equipping our living room with six TVs so we never miss a game. Until that day comes—which, okay, it probably won’t—Sportsnet’s fantastically in-depth offerings keep us on top of every touchdown, home run, and GOOOOOOOAL. That's why it's our 2016 App of the Year for Apple TV.
editorialNotes.short: Get game highlights, team stats and post-game recaps.
Create a fantasy team with friends and get the most out of game day.
editorialNotes.standard: If you want to play fantasy sports, there are—ahem—leagues of apps to choose from. But we think ESPN Fantasy might be the MVP. Its minimal interface stays out of our way so we can focus on draft picks, trades, and managing our lineup. But the best part? ESPN’s got mini-stories on all of the hot prospects. So the more time we spend actually using the app, the better our team ends up.

editorialNotes.short: Subscribe to watch the season live.
Follow the weekend’s events with news, schedules, scores and highlights.
Get full coverage of the new season with news, stats and more.
editorialNotes.tagline: Get the latest stats and news

editorialNotes.standard: Tally stats about your skiing and snowboarding adventures–distance covered, how fast you were going, even how long you waited on a chairlift–then easily review and share with others.
editorialNotes.short: Get ready to record your adventures on the slopes.

editorialNotes.standard: With up-to-the-minute live scores and an unmatched level of in-depth reporting, this app is a haven for fans across sports and leagues. Follow your favourites–and explore original podcasts and live streams.

editorialNotes.standard: The MLB app really does knock it out of the park. Preview the day’s matchups, buy tickets to a game, and follow along via live pitch tracking and high-resolution ballpark renderings.

editorialNotes.short: Invite your sports mates to matches and organise your sporting events.
